name: IDEMIA
description: From 2017 to Current. Desktop,Web and Mobile Apps Developer / Pre-Sales Expert, Developer, (Android, iOS, Web). Developer in Android, iOS and Web specialized in facial, finger and iris biometrics. Biometric devices integration in both mobile and web applications. Technical leader in development teams in Latin America and development of Front-End, Back-End and Mobiles Apps projects. Supporting in pre-sales and post-sales area for issues related to the biometrics technologies implemented.
